title: Bobby Bragan Youth Foundation
text: SR Bats is proud to partner with the Bobby Bragan Collegiate Slugger Award. Tracy Taylor, Executive Director of the Bobby Bragan Youth Foundation and Collegiate Slugger Award, states “SR Bats is a great fit with the Bobby Bragan Collegiate Slugger Award, not only from a baseball and strategic standpoint but also in sharing the same values as our founder and the Bobby Bragan Youth Foundation. Scott and Tony Rodges have put SR Bats on a great trajectory for success that is very similar to the growth and acceptance of Bobby Bragan Collegiate Slugger Award. We have a great opportunity to continue to grow together.”
